rooms.description: Art Deco inspired with geometric patterns and decorative moldings, providing a welcoming first impression.
Spacious living area featuring elegant Art Deco furniture, bold colors, and ornamental detailing. Large windows for natural light.
Dining space with a blend of modern and vintage design, complementing the Art Deco theme.
Functional kitchen designed with a fusion of traditional Indian elements and Art Deco aesthetics. Adequate storage and prep area.
Luxurious master bedroom on the ground floor with ample space for relaxation, incorporating Vastu principles by placing it in the southwest corner for harmony.
Secondary bedroom designed with a blend of Art Deco elegance and traditional comfort.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and quiet, arranged in accordance with Vastu orientation for balanced energy flow.
Fourth bedroom on the ground floor, designed to maintain symmetry and balance in line with Vastu guidelines.
Well-equipped bathroom integrated into a private corner of the ground floor.

openings.description: Main entrance with Art Deco styled door frames and sidelights, adhering to Vastu principles by facing north for positive energy influx.
Large bay windows on the living room facade providing natural light and external views.
Functional window openings ensuring ventilation and light in the kitchen area.

additional_features.description: Expansive garden featuring landscaping with local flora, designed to provide a serene outdoor space, aligning with Vastu recommendations for energy balance.
A dedicated library area on the ground floor, incorporating Art Deco elements such as intricate woodwork and vintage accents. Designed to be a quiet retreat for reading and study.
